main event: An observer reported seeing two lights in Richmond, Maine, which seemed to appear and disappear on a periodic interval, while another account described a disc-shaped object with lights observed nearby.
interesting points: The lights appeared on the left side of the observer and seemed to move relative to one another,One of the lights was anchored while the other light moved,The observer suspected that the lights might be ships rather than aircraft,The object seen by the second observer was described as disc-shaped, approximately 40 to 50 feet in diameter,The sighting occurred the night before a report was made to Air Force Command.
sighted object: two lights and a disc-shaped object
